document_data.name: Sirius Rulak
document_data.mainbody: '''Sirius Rulak''' was a [[Zhentarim]] mercenary commander in [[Daggerdale]] around [[1479 DR]].
document_data.History:
Rulak and his squad were paid by the [[Shadovar]] to expel a large band of [[gnoll]]s from [[Anauroch]]. Instead of killing the gnolls, Rulak devised a plan to drive the band to Daggerdale. He later offered his services to Daggerdale's leaders to eliminate the gnolls.{{Cite organized play/LFR/Blades for Daggerdale|4}}

Rulak was assembled by the mayor of [[Dagger Falls]] with the constable and an adventuring party hired by [[Kendar Morn]] for a meeting to decide the best option for dealing with the gnolls.
